name: ANgST (itch)
description:
There are two kinds of people in the world. Those who already forgot their time in middle school and those who remember it as the most horrible time of their life.

Through this experience, ANgST exposes the player to the reality of social anxiety. Its goal is to raise awareness to this condition and even help dealing with it through immersion in the game's mechanics.

The current version contains about 25% of the planned map, but I believe it generates a complete experience.

I'll be happy to hear your feedback! Please fill in this form after you've played the game:

ANgST Demo Feedback
